summary:
Achievements:

• Two times “Rising Star” award winner from Cognizant Netherlands
• One Time “SPOT AWARD” winner from Cognizant Netherlands
• Hackathon Winner for “Cloud Automation – One Touch Provisioning” from KPN BV

Responsibilities:

• Design/architect/implement projects utilizing Amazon Web Services cloud which meets HA, DR, scalability, security, RPO & RTO
• Certified AWS Solution Architect – Associate , AWS Solution Architect – Professional and AWS Developer – Associate 
• Implementation of Docker, and various Docker orchestration tools such as docker-compose, docker swarm
• Container orchestration using Kubernetes
• Configuration management automation using Ansible 
• Cloud Infra Provisioning automation using Terraform 
• Working knowledge on CICD chain using Git, Jenkins
• Responsible for stakeholder management
• Building and Installing, Managing CA UIM (Nimsoft), Spectrum, eHealth, APM, Zenoss monitoring tools 
• Having working knowledge of proxy load balancing application nginx
• Well-versed in Linux and Windows Operating systems administration 
• Promote cost reduction and efficiency by leveraging the latest “best-fit” technology 
• Proactively investigate and suggest the use of new technologies that help with gaining efficiencies and/or increase ROI in new technology initiatives 
• Recommend new technology solutions and implement strategies to drive cloud-based productivity
• Evaluate the requirements and determine actionable tasks, estimates and provide efforts for migration scenarios
• Have Strong working experience in Amazon EC2, S3, Glacier, EBS, EFS, Amazon RDS, Amazon VPC, Amazon Route53, CloudFront, CloudWatch, Auto Scaling, Elastic Load Balancing (ELB), Lambda, Code Commit, Code Build, Code Deploy, X-RAY.
• Certified Agile Professional Scrum Master (PSM I) and solid Working experience on Agile scrum team from last 4+ years
• Training and motivating DevOps team colleagues on Cloud/Kubernetes/Docker/Linux/Scrum training.
• Automate business process and technical operating procedure using Robotic process automation tool such as UIPath and WinTask
• Working experience on designing, creating Jaspersoft Reports/dashboards
• Experience in requirement gathering, Tools Consolidation, Solution and Designing, driving transitioning & transformation projects.
• Having experience on managing multiple dev-ops team across different locations (Onshore/Offshore).

certifications.name: AWS Security Governance At Scale - Technical

profile_positions.description:
Responsible to quickly establish relationships and become a trusted advisor for all stakeholders of strategic clients
Responsible to lead solutioning engagements of potential Cloud Migrations, Modernisation of Business Critical Systems and Observability Stack of Booking.com
Responsible to drive a transparent feedback loop from the client and market to internal stakeholders in various product teams to help prioritise the technical development of the solution, based on validated business cases and industry knowledge
Ensures that the development and implementation of technical solutions for respective clients are part of the overall account strategy, by working closely and aligning with the responsible Product and Engineering Managers and Teams.
Responsible to drive effective decision-making with clients by identifying needs and motivations then translating them into actions.
Responsible to assess, deeply understand and shape the solution landscape of strategic Clients by identifying opportunities to reduce complexity, coupling and accelerate the adoption of Cloud 1st approach and Cloud Observability.
Responsible to support and improve Cloud Adoption, Cloud Observability based on Open Standard Framework, Cloud Transformation technical capabilities around Booking.com platform and infrastructure, by developing and delivering a scalable learning path and Architectural workshops
profile_positions.title: Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
• Design/architect/implement projects utilizing Amazon Web Services cloud which meets HA, DR, scalability, security, RPO & RTO
• Implementation of Docker and Kubernetes
• Configuration management automation using Ansible
• Cloud Provisioning automation using Terraform
• Working knowledge on CICD chain using Git, Gradle, Jenkins
• Responsible for stakeholder management
• Building and Installing, Managing CA UIM (Nimsoft), Spectrum, eHealth, APM, Zenoss monitoring tools
• Well-versed in Linux and Windows Operating systems administration
• Promote cost reduction and efficiency by leveraging the latest “best-fit” technology
• Proactively investigate and suggest the use of new technologies that help with gaining efficiencies and/or increase ROI in new technology initiatives
• Recommend new technology solutions and implement strategies to drive cloud-based productivity
• Have Strong working experience in Amazon EC2, S3, Glacier, EBS, EFS, Amazon RDS, Amazon VPC, Amazon Route53, CloudFront, CloudWatch, Auto Scaling, Elastic Load Balancing (ELB), Lambda, Code Commit, Code Build, Code Deploy, X-RAY.
• Certified Agile Professional Scrum Master (PSM I) and solid Working experience on Agile scrum team from last 3+ years
• Training and motivating DevOps team colleagues on Cloud/Kubernetes/Docker/Linux/Scrum training.
• Working experience on designing, creating Jaspersoft Reports/dashboards
• Writing extensive scripting to enable the Real User Monitoring (RUM) and Synthetic Monitoring for web applications, proprietary applications and thick client based applications such as Citrix.
• Experience in requirement gathering, Tools Consolidation, Solution and Designing, driving transitioning & transformation projects.
• Having experience on managing multiple dev-ops team across different locations (Onshore/Offshore).
profile_positions.title: Principal Infra Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Implementation of Docker, and various Docker orchestration tools such as docker-compose, docker swarm
•	Docker cluster setup and management 
•	Set Up and Configure Universal Control Plane (UCP) and Docker Trusted Repository (DTR) for Secure Cluster Management 
•	Create a Docker Bridge Network for a Developer to Use for Their Containers, Configure Docker for External DNS
•	Creating a New Image from a Container, Managing Containers (Creating, Starting and Stopping) and Create a Swarm Cluster
•	Creating and Working With Volumes and Working with the Storage Drivers
•	Building and Installing, Managing CA UIM, Spectrum, eHealth, APM, Zenoss monitoring tools to monitor datacenter devices, cloud, microservices such as Docker, servers such as Linux, Solaris, Window, AIX, database such as MS SQL, Mysql, Oracle, DB2, Mongodb, Hadoop, VMware, HyperV, Applications availability and performance monitoring.
•	Working experience on designing, creating Jaspersoft Reports/dashboards
•	Writing extensive scripting to enable the Real User Monitoring (RUM) and Synthetic Monitoring for web applications, proprietary applications and thick client based applications such as Citrix.
profile_positions.title: Infra Dev Specialist

company.name: Siemens Technology and Services Pvt Ltd

profile_positions.company: Siemens Technology and Services Pvt Ltd
profile_positions.description:
Designing and implementing CA Nimsoft,CA Spectrum, CA eHealth monitoring solution for Siemens Healthcare datacenter hosted networking devices.
Part of Architecture and consulting team wherein got the opportunity to involve in planning, designing and implementing the various CA products such as CA Nimsoft, CA Spectrum, CA eHealth and SysEdge.
Deployed Nimsoft in Dev, test environment before deployed in production environment.
Managing 25 remote Nimsoft HUB's along with two primary and secondary Nimsoft HUB's
Configured Nimsoft on a high availability.
Configured Nimsoft Tunnel between Nimsoft remote HUB's and Nimsoft primary HUB's.
Integrated Nimsoft with service desk tool
On boarding and off boarding devices from tools.
Installing and customizing Nimsoft UMP and UR
Deploying, Configuring and Managing HUB,Robot and Probes on devices.
Involving in tools troubleshooting.
Helping analyzing RCA
Working on Service Desk tickets
Participate in monitoring improvement plan meeting with other service delivery unit like networks ,Servers and Application team.
Creating knowledge base documents.
Training team members on moniotring tools.
profile_positions.title: Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Installing,implementing and integrating enterprise monitoring tools such as CA Spectrum Infrastructure Manager r9.2 ,CA eHealth r6.2, Microsoft SCOM 2007 R2 and HP SIM 6.3
Configuring and deploying monitoring agents on the networking devices include servers and application.
Creating and managing tools backup (CA Spectrum,CA eHealth)
Managing users on the tools
Helping to other service delivery unit to identify the route cause of networking problems.
creating and managing capacity,performance and availability reports.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consutant

profile_positions.description:
	Installing ,Configuring and administering CA Spectrum, CA eHealth
	Implemented fault tolerant and distributed environment
	Integrated CA Spectrum with CA eHealth
	As part of Network Monitoring Tools Team, my role is to deploying agents on the network devices like Servers, Routers, Firewall, Switches.
	Installing SNMP service and configuring SNMP service.
	Adding new devices in to CA Spectrum, CA eHealth
	Configuring CPU, Memory, File System, WAN Interface threshold values for each network components in the Monitoring tools.
	Configuring Service, Process, Event log, Application monitoring for servers in the monitoring tool.
	Creating module /Groups and adding /moving respective devices to respective module/groups in monitoring tool such as CA Spectrum, eHealth.
	Creating schedule maintenance task as required.
	Generating on demand reports from CA Spectrum, CA eHealth
	Scheduling DDM and SSDB database
	Installing and configuring CA SystemEdge agent
profile_positions.title: System Engineer

profile_positions.description:
	Providing 1st level technical support to the Wipro AMC contracted customers.
	Worked on application issues like MS Office,Outlook
	Installing Operating system using OS image
	Monitoring backup jobs and Unix Batchman jobs.
	Producing Capacity, Performance and Availability reports as required.
	Screening all incident and change requests that are in our queue and make sure all the tickets are closed within given SLA.
	Documenting the shift report and handing over with all the updates about the shifts to next shift professional.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Executive
